channel.title: Need help making NPC say two things

item.title: Need help making NPC say two things
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Ok i want to make it so an npc has two boxes of dialogue, give you an item, and teleport you back to home. This is what I have so far
These are in my client.java

if(NPCID == 3104){ NpcDialogue = 140; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

case 140: talk("Sorry Santa had to go help the evles he isnt here.", 3104); break; case 141: talk("Here is your reward for all you help "+playerName+"", 3104); addItem(8050, 1); break;
and then i have this in my clickingmost.java

if(c.NpcDialogue == 141){ c.closeAll(); c.toX = 3087; c.toY = 3491; }
Now my problem is the NPC only says the case 140 and then he dosent teleport because the NPC dosent say case 141
If im forgetting something or did something wrong please tell me THX. Im kind of new to coding[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 11:17:41 am[/size][hr]Any1 please?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making NPC say two things
